Sentencas: A reversible solid oxide cell can work as a fuel cell (FC) or an electrolyzer cell (EC) with superior efficiency in a single device, which has the potential to become the core of energy conversion and storage.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Since the redox reaction occurs at the three phase boundary in the porous electrode, the microstructure of which has a significant effect on the dynamic performance of the cell.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Current research on porous electrodes mainly focuses on parametric and steady-state analysis but lacks studies on dynamic performance.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: In this study, we investigate the mass transfer process and dynamic performance of rSOC fuel electrodes by 3D reconstruction and artificial generation combined with a two-dimensional lattice Boltzmann method.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The results show that the effective diffusion coefficients and cell performance of the XCT cross-sectional and random sphere method are much higher than those of the Gaussian filter and fiber rod structure.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The change in H2 concentration is larger for switching from FC to EC compared to switching from EC to FC, but the transient steady-state difference and relaxation time of the voltage is smaller.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: These results can be used as a reference for the design and optimization of the porous electrodes in reversible solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and optimization of porous fuel electrode in reversible solid oxide cells based on the Lattice Boltzmann method
